turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a blond cinnamon shortbread latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where? At the Starbucks at 101 Broadway East or 1401 Broadway?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Neither, at 1124 Pike Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. The blond cinnamon shortbread latte is not avaliable.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a cinnamon latte and an espresso, then?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The cinnamon latte is not avaliable. Espresso added.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nevermind the espresso, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Espresso removed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced mocha latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Iced cafe mocha or Black and White mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Black and white mocha. And a blond eggnog latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Both added. That'll cost $7.53. What size would you like for the black and white mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti. And venti for the blong eggnog.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Full for black and white mocha, 2% for blond eggnog.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else for the drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whipped cream and marshmellows on both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That starbucks location does not have marshmellows.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, just whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, both drinks will be ready for pickup shortly.
